body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Jeffrey Washington and the customer's name is Michelle White.  The conversation is about Phat Hogs (a Motorcycle Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Jeffrey Washington, and I’m a representative from Phat Hogs Motorcycle Dealership.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's great to meet you, Michelle! How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I’m feeling a bit overwhelmed with my motorcycle search.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I completely understand, Michelle. Finding the right motorcycle can be quite a task. May I ask how long you have been riding?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I've been riding for about three years now.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: That’s wonderful! And just to help us assist you better, could you please share your zip code?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it’s one zero one zero one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you! And could you also tell me your age range? Are you in your twenties, thirties, or a different category?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great! Thank you for sharing that information, Michelle. We'll make sure to find the best options that suit your needs.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Michelle! If you have any more questions or need assistance, feel free to reach out. Have a fantastic day!
